00013 #include "Function.H"

00016 
00027 class RealFunction: public Function {
00028     public:
00029         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00030                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00031                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00032                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv):
00033                 Function(name, _tmin, _tmax, _dt, _umin, _umax, _du,
00034                          _vmin, _vmax, _dv) { }
00035         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00036 };
00037 
00038 
00039 /*******************************************************************************
00040  *
00041  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00042  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00043  *  but need not
00044  */
00045 
00047 
00049 
00057 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00058     public:
00059         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00060                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00061                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00062                      double _rad = 1);
00063         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00064         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0,
00065                                     double = 0) { Radius = _a; }
00066 
00067     protected:
00068         virtual function_type f;
00069         virtual function_type normal;
00070 
00071         double Radius;
00072 };

00082 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00083     public:
00084         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00085                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00086                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00087                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00088         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00089         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00090                                     double _c = 0, double = 0) {
00091                                         R = _a; r = _b; rho = _c; }
00092 
00093     protected:
00094         virtual function_type f;
00095 
00096         double R, r, rho;
00097 };

00149 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00150     public:
00151         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00152                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00153                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00154                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00155         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00156         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00157             M = _a; R = _b;
00158         }
00159 
00160     protected:
00161         virtual function_type f;
00162 
00163         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00164         R;
00165 };
